item.title: Patching Gaps in the CIS Windows 11 Benchmark - BitLocker
item.description: Everyone loves a security benchmark, and with the imminent move to Windows 11 for everyone, the Center for Internet Security released version 3.0.1 of theirs, including a build kit for Microsoft Intune, but what does this build kit break for BitLocker encryption?

item.title: Remediating BitLocker DMA Exception Errors with Microsoft Intune
item.description: So you’ve configured BitLocker encryption in Microsoft Intune, but some of your devices are failing to encrypt complaining about a DMA exception issue as part of Automatic Encryption. How can we fix that without creating a gaping security hole?
